articles.title: Sherwood: Pochettino and Benitez are 'fashionable and sexy' to Newcastle because they're foreign - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Former Tottenham manager Tim Sherwood believes Steve Bruce deserves the opportunity to manage Newcastle post-takeover
articles.content:
Tim Sherwood has claimed Mauricio Pochettino and Rafa Benitez are only more appealing options to Newcastle fans than Steve Bruce because it is 'fashionable' to appoint a foreign manager.

articles.content:
